register.name: DC_CISW
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Clean and Invalidate by Set/Way
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data cache by set/way.

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: DC_CIVAC
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Clean and Invalidate by VA to PoC
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data cache by address to Point of Coherency.

register.name: DC_CSW
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Clean by Set/Way

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: DC_CVAC
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Clean by VA to PoC
register.description: Clean data cache by address to Point of Coherency.

register.name: DC_CVAU
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Clean by VA to PoU
register.description: Clean data cache by address to Point of Unification.

register.name: IC_IALLU
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Invalidate All to PoU
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches to Point of Unification.

register.name: IC_IALLUIS
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Invalidate All to PoU, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches in Inner Shareable domain to Point of Unification.

register.name: DC_ISW
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Invalidate by Set/Way

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: DC_IVAC
register.gui_name: Data or unified Cache line Invalidate by VA to PoC
register.description: Invalidate data cache by address to Point of Coherency.

register.name: IC_IVAU
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache line Invalidate by VA to PoU
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache by address to Point of Unification.

register.name: DC_ZVA
register.description: Zero data cache by address. Zeroes a naturally aligned block of N bytes, where the size of N is identified in DCZID_EL0.
